perturbation.original_text: This term of this Agreement and the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue in perpetuity (the “Term”), unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions contained herein.
perturbation.changed_text: This term of this Agreement and the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue for a period of one (1) year (the “Term”), unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions contained herein.
perturbation.explanation: Section 9 originally stated that the contract term was in perpetuity. By changing this to a one-year term, it directly contradicts the 'unless terminated earlier' clause, creating ambiguity. One section implies that the contract can last indefinitely, while the other limits it to one year, regardless of termination clauses.
